name: test_e2e_with_logs[082_SQLI_STACK_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_006` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL file read |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_query |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; SELECT pg_read_file('/etc/passwd'); --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%3B%20SELECT%20pg_read_file%28%27%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%27%29%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~9000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:54:39.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Traversal] File inclusion attack detected test_id=SQLI_STACK_006-1769864079852-gl2a54 pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_006 uri=/?q=%27%3B%20SELECT%20pg_read_file%28%27%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%27%29%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |
